title: Multi-Day Photochemical Evolution of Organic Aerosol from Biomass Burning Emissions

Biomass burning is an important source of primary and secondary organic aerosol (POA, SOA, and together, OA) to the atmosphere. The photochemical evolution of biomass burning OA, especially over long...
